name: Codename: Rogue Fleet
description:
A match of Rogue Fleet will pit two team of 12 players against each other. At the start of a match, players will choose their ship and with the help of their team, by managing the strengths and weaknesses of their respective ships, players will achieve victory by destroying all enemy ships.Features
  • Destructible turrets, missile launchers and ship's sub-systems.
  • 10 ships to choose from, with various strengths and weaknesses , split between 5 classes.
  • Radically different gameplay when playing capital ship as opposed to fighters.
